data.meta_site_name: Larry Miller Obituary | January 4, 2024 | Colonial Terrace Funeral Home & Crematory - Eldorado, IL
data.text:
Larry T. Miller, 83, passed away Thursday, January 4, 2024 at Wabash Christian Village in Carmi. Larry was born January 22, 1940 in Equality, Illinois to the late Bailey and Billie L. (Steinbrook) Miller. Larry worked in the Oil Field and Insurance industry. He served in the US Army during Vietnam. In addition to his parents he was preceded in death by a son: James Miller. He is survived by two cousins Connie (Donnie) Brockett of Omaha, and Janet Wilson of Florida. Services will be private. Condolences and expressions of sympathy may be sent to the family via the website www.colonialterracefuneralhome.com

To send flowers to the family or plant a tree in memory of Larry T. Miller, please visit our floral store.
